about_the_game:
"Train 99" is a unique time management tool that combines the Pomodoro Technique with a perfect blend of focused work and relaxation. In this game, you embark on a healing and delightful train journey, driven by your concentration. As the train reaches each unique station, you unlock heartwarming stories and collect beautifully crafted items left behind by passengers. Whether you're at work, studying, or navigating everyday life, "Train 99" will accompany you through each productive and enjoyable moment.




Innovative Pomodoro Technique: Set focused time periods to propel the train forward. Each Pomodoro session marks the beginning of a new journey, making your focus time filled with anticipation and motivation.

Unique Healing Stories: Every time the train arrives at a new station, a heartwarming and touching story is unlocked, providing soothing and healing moments during your short breaks.

Item Collection Fun: As your journey progresses, you’ll have the chance to collect various unique items left behind by passengers. These items not only carry their stories but also become cherished memories of your journey.

Perfect Combination of Focus and Relaxation: Alternate between focus sessions and relaxation periods, allowing you to work efficiently while also enjoying the pleasure of relaxation, preventing burnout.

Simple and Elegant Visual Design: The game features a fresh and natural art style, accompanied by soothing background music, creating a relaxing and focused atmosphere.





Whether you're a student, a professional, or a freelancer, "Train 99: A Journey of Focus" is the perfect tool to help you improve your productivity. It not only enhances your concentration but also brings a touch of relaxation and warmth amidst your busy schedule.

Hop aboard Train 99 now, and let’s embark on this efficient and delightful journey together!
